entities.name: seeker
entities.description: The person responsible for catching the Golden Snitch. (Excerpt: "Seeker, who had the hardest job of all...")

entities.name: golden snitch
entities.description: A tiny, winged, walnut-sized ball that ends the game and earns 150 points for the Seeker's team. (Excerpt: "a tiny, winged, walnut-sized ball...")

entities.name: oliver wood
entities.description: A burly seventeen-year-old student at Hogwarts who is the Seeker of Gryffindor team. (Excerpt: "Oliver Wood was a burly seventeen-year-old...")

entities.name: gryffindor
entities.description: A Quidditch team at Hogwarts that has not won the Cup for seven years. (Excerpt: "Gryﬀindor hasn’t won for seven years now...")

entities.name: quidditch cup
entities.description: A trophy awarded to the winning team of Quidditch tournament. (Excerpt: "This is our last chance — my last chance — to win the Quidditch Cup...")

entities.name: hogwarts
entities.description: A school where Oliver Wood and his teammates are students. (Excerpt: "Oliver Wood was a burly seventeen-year-old, now in his seventh and ﬁnal year at Hogwarts...")

entities.name: quidditch field
entities.description: A location where Quidditch games are played. (Excerpt: "There was a quiet sort of desperation in his voice as he addressed his six fellow team members in the chilly locker rooms on the edge of the darkening Quidditch ﬁeld...")

relationships.description: Oliver Wood is a member of Gryffindor team. (Excerpt: "Oliver Wood was a burly seventeen-year-old, now in his seventh and ﬁnal year at Hogwarts...")
Oliver Wood's goal is to win the Quidditch Cup. (Excerpt: "This is our last chance — my last chance — to win the Quidditch Cup...")
Gryffindor team's target is to win the Quidditch Cup. (Excerpt: "This is our last chance — my last chance — to win the Quidditch Cup...")
